entries.name: uri
entries.desc: The URI this source will fetch gems from.

entries.name: new(uri)
entries.desc: Creates a new Source which will use the index located at uri.

entries.name: <=>(other)
entries.desc: Sources are ordered by installation preference.

entries.name: cache_dir(uri)
entries.desc: Returns the local directory to write uri to.

entries.name: download(spec, dir=Dir.pwd)
entries.desc: Downloads spec and writes it to dir.  See also Gem::RemoteFetcher#download.

entries.name: fetch_spec(name_tuple)
entries.desc: Fetches a specification for the given name_tuple.

entries.name: load_specs(type)
entries.desc: Loads type kind of specs fetching from +@uri+ if the on-disk cache is out of date.

entries.name: update_cache?()
entries.desc: Returns true when it is possible and safe to update the cache directory.
